page.title: 17Impressions of North Runcton
page.content: We asked some of our pupils who live on a housing estate in Kings Lynn whether they would like to live in North Runcton. They mostly agreed that they liked the peace and quiet there and one girl said that the village green was very pretty. But all thought that there was too little to do there and they did not like the idea of not being within reach of shops. One pupil was put off by the fact that there were no street lights. They said that without a bus service they would not be able to go anywhere. Many also disliked the fact that the busy main road was close. When we asked the same about Middleton our pupils disliked the noise from the main road and most did not want to go to so small a school. One boy said he liked North Runcton because there was no schoolthere!
